title: Ethan's New Mission
description: The Reapers exist and they don’t discriminate. They also don’t always let their victims live. It’s been over six months since Ethan has seen his best friend, Charlie. Doubt and worry that he’ll never see him again begin to creep in when Charlie makes his sudden appearance. With big offers and promises of dreams fulfilled, how can Ethan say no?Getting kidnapped, waking up on a cold metal slab, and shoved into slavery was not on the agenda for the weekend vacation in space Ethan was promised.Is Ethan strong enough to handle what will be thrown his way?Will he manage to get free and put his new outrageous idea into motion?*Ethan’s New Mission is the second installment in the New Life series that contains some cussing and dark themes that some may find troubling. This book also features amazing adventures, aliens, challenging situations, and immense growth for our characters.*
author: Melissa           Smith
